Text.Page:
(The dead soldier has dog-tags that read "Nilos," and a shiny gold ring engraved with the phrase "from your loving Glorine.")

(There's a Glorine stationed in the Relic Hunter Outpost.)

That's the ring I gave Nilos...a year ago, to the day.

It's almost funny. Ours was a wartime romance. At first, you feel like it could be snatched away at any moment, but then you feel like it'll never end because "we've already survived so much."

There's nothing too big that it can't be dreamed...or undreamed, is there?
